title: Banana cake with cream cheese icing
ingredients: ['For the Cake', '175g butter', '425g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '375g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '350ml buttermilk', '2 teaspoons lemon juice', '350g mashed bananas', 'For the Cream Cheese Icing', '110g butter, softened', '225g cream cheese, softened', '425g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
